pages.text: Bauxite Ore is found in the world between layers 32 and 112, and requires a Stone Pickaxe to harvest. $(br)The raw ore will smelt into aluminium ingots, which is an integral part of high-voltage architecture.
Lead Ore is found in the world between layers -32 and 80, and requires an Iron Pickaxe to harvest. $(br)The raw ore will smelt into lead ingots, which are used in creating early accumulators.

Silver Ore is found in the world between layers -48 and 32, and requires an Iron Pickaxe to harvest. $(br)The raw ore will smelt into silver ingots, which alloy with gold to create electrum, a far more effective conductor.

Nickel Ore is found in the world between layers -64 and 24, but more abundantly below -8. It requires an Iron Pickaxe to harvest. $(br)The raw ore will smelt into nickel ingots, which alloy with copper to create constantan, a heat resistant conductor used in the construction of $(l:patchouli:power/thermoelectric_generator)Thermoelectric Generators$().

Uranium Ore is found in the world between layers -64 and -16, and requires an Iron Pickaxe to harvest. $(br)The raw ore will smelt into uranium ingots, but there are currently not many uses for the metal. A uranium block can serve as a heatsource for the $(l:patchouli:power/thermoelectric_generator)Thermoelectric Generator$() and the metal will be used in future endeavours.
